title: Google giving app developers more time to fill the Play Store’s Data safety section
content:
Last May, Google announced that each app in the Play Store is getting a “Data safety” section. It serves a dual-purpose for developers and end users alike, but Google Play is now delaying the launch until later this year.

more…

The post Google giving app developers more time to fill the Play Store’s Data safety section  appeared first on 9to5Google.
